text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook How can you spend time talking shit on Twitter when you are the president of a country where 100,000 people have died of coronavirus in the past 4 months? If you are bored, you should pick up an English grammar textbook and learn capitalization rules, ass. No more tanning please!
